person.persName: Junius Ward Johnson (Son of George Washington Johnson and Ann Eliza Viley)

body.p: Residence: Georgetown, Scott County, Kentucky. Son of Provisional Governor George Washington Johnson and Ann Eliza Viley. Matriculated from Scott County, Kentucky to the Virginia Military Institute in 1864. He served with the cadets in the Richmond, Virginia trenches until disbanded on April 2, 1865.
